'''''Operation Graze''''' is a [[Daily Commission]] that occurs in various areas of [[Sumeru]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|Reach the destination within the time limit.}}
# Reach the destination within the time limit 0/1
#* Objective: Reach the target location within (90/120) second(s)

==Gameplay Notes==
* Stand on the [[Pressure Plate]] to start the challenge.
* Use the [[Glider]] and [[Four-Leaf Sigil]]s to reach each checkpoint and the final destination.
* There is a time limit of 90 or 120 seconds.
** The Ardravi Valley and The Temples Forsaken versions have a time limit of 90 seconds.
** The Bayt Al-Muazzam and Desert of Hadramaveth (near [[Dunes of Steel]]) versions have a time limit of 120 seconds.
